lead_paragraph: KARETSKY--Dr. Alfred J. Died May 9th surrounded by his loving family at the age of 79. Beloved husband of Bernice for 57 years. Dear brother of Samuel and the late David. Devoted father of Marc (Melissa), Marcia Goldstein (Brian) and Gary (Holly). Grandfather of Jordan, Oliver and Paige Goldstein, Ethan and Ross Karetsky, Ryan, Zachary and Daniel Karetsky. A respected dentist for over 50 years. Basketball star at Stuyvesant High School and Lafayette College. He was loved by all who had the privilege to know him. Services 11:30am, Wednesday, May 11th at Westchester Reform Temple, 255 Mamaroneck Road, Scarsdale, New York. 1/3
